sources.title: Casper's Birthday Party (1959)
sources.description: Casper the Friendly Ghost goes out to find some friends to come to his birthday party. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/caspers-birthday-party-1959/

metadata.Plot: Casper with no success goes out to make friends that he can invite to his birthday party.
metadata.Director: Seymour Kneitel, Izzy Sparber, Steve Muffati
metadata.Writer: Larz Bourne, Isadore Klein, Seymour Kneitel
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Norma MacMillan
